attributes.action: have a mandatory prison sentece for disqualified drivers and also people driving without a proper license for the vehicle they are driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i propose that anyone driving without a license or a provisional license without the proper supervision on our roads should be subject to a mandatory time in prison.
As the amount of people driving on our roads without the proper paperwork and not doing the official tests that we are all subject to and work hard to get through is not acceptable.
most criminals use vehicles to sell their drugs from and commit other offences whilst endangering life to the innocent public, also most accidents are from people who dont have the appropriate paperwork....license, insurance etc.
i propose the sentence should be three months in prison.
